welcome_message_body: Welcome to Huntsville, where Southern hospitality meets cutting-edge technology. Explore our charming city known for its rich history, delicious food, and exciting outdoor adventures. Enjoy your time here and make the most of your visit!

airports.airport_name: Huntsville International - Carl T. Jones Field

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Huntsville International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Carl T. Jones Field Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Huntsville International Airport, primarily used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.
